gameDetails.name: Darwin's Journey: Komodo Dragon
gameDetails.description:
The Darwin's Journey: Komodo mini-expansion introduces a new element to the museum: twenty new bonus tiles that replace the existing bonus coins.

Players can earn these new rewards by delivering specimens. After delivering a specimen, players will place a corresponding bonus tile in another bonus display. Additionally, players can access these bonus displays by researching the Komodo Dragon, which moves across the islands based on the specimens delivered.

—description from the publisher
